name: Myrmex, Young
condition_immunities: exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, unconscious

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) poison.

actions.name: Earth Shift
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +2 to hit 60' 1 tgt in contact with the ground. Target is pushed up to 10 ft. in a direction of myrmex's choice and its speed is reduced by 5 ft. until end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Earth Manipulation
bonus_actions.desc: Can manipulate and move earth within 30' of it that fits within a 5 ft. cube. This manipulation is limited only by its imagination but it often includes creating caricatures of creatures to tell stories of travels or etching symbols to denote dangerous caverns or similar markers for those in the colony. Can also choose to make ground within 10 ft. of it difficult terrain or to make difficult terrain normal if the ground is earth or stone. Changes caused by Earth Manipulation are permanent.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Limited Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: Magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120' of it that can understand a language. This telepathy doesn't allow receiving creature to telepathically respond.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

special_abilities.name: Stone Walk
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain composed of earth or stone doesn't cost the myrmex extra movement.
